content.text:
The data_removal_mechanism type is defined in Table 30 for Opal:

[Table: table_51_277]

Table 31 defines the enumeration values. The mechanisms associated with each Enumeration Value are defined in
Table 10.

[Table: table_51_439]

tables.markdown:
| UID | Name | Format | |:---|:---|:---| | 00 00 00 05 00 00 04 20 | data_removal_mechanism | Enumeration_Type,
0,
7 | | Enumeration Value | Associated Value | | | 0 | Overwrite Data Erase | | | 1 | Block Erase | | | 2 | Cryptographic Erase | | | 3 – 4 | Reserved | | | 5 | Vendor Specific Erase | | | 6-7 | Reserved | |
